content: if your kid is as obsessed with minecraft as my nephews are then you will absolutely love these awesome minecraft crochet keychains this pattern includes the pattern for steve alex and the creeper these keychains take approximately 45 minutes to an hour each to crochet using dk yarn and a 2 75mm crochet hook these turn out to be approximately 1 25 inch each this listing is for the ads-free print-friendly pattern you can also find the pattern for free at https //chaicoffeecrochet com/minecraft-crochet/
